Question: Gamma Pulse CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Gamma Pulse CES 2024

- DreameBot X30 Ultra smart vacuum with new add-on blade attachment for preventing tangles and a new attachment for the bottom of its auto-empty docking station
- ExoBrew home beer brewer with all-in-one brewer and app for beer discovery
- Withings BeamO home checkup device with multiple sensors for at-home wellness checkup and FDA pending approval
- Govee smart lights with Matter support, new lighting products, and improved AI sync box
- Ugreen NAS with a range of network-attached storage devices, including various ports, Intel processors, and 10Gb Ethernet
- Mui Board Gen 2 Matter controller with Matter certification and display for smart home control
- J5create Thunderbolt 5 dock with various ports including Thunderbolt, USB-A, and Ethernet
- Xgimi IMAX 4K projector with auto-adjusting capabilities, IMAX-enhanced picture quality, and support for Apple AirPlay
- Targus Ergo Flip Mouse with a unique design that allows it to switch from left-handed to right-handed use
- Hyper Magsafe, Qi2, & Thunderbolt 5 accessories including updated 4-in-1 charger, MagSafe SSD enclosure, and Thunderbolt 5 dock
